master.description: The URL of the Mesos master. This should point to the Mesos ZNode on the Zookeeper machine.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Marathon instance.

instances.description: Number of Marathon instances to run.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each Marathon task.

port.description: The port number of the Logstash-Mesos management front-end. Defaults to 9092.

image.description: The docker scheduler image to use.

heap-size.description: The heap-size in MB that is used to run the java executor inside the executor container.

logstash-heap-size.description: The heap-size in MB that is used to run logstash inside the executor container.

volumes.description: Comma-separated list of absolute directory-paths on the slave, containing log files that logstash should have read-only access to
